project_descr: This project will contribute to building post disaster recovery capacities of national governments (countries) and regional intergovernmental organizations (IGOs) to assess, plan, implement and monitor recovery processes.

outputs.output_descr: Strengthening capacities for Post Disaster Needs Assessment and Recovery Preparedness, building resilience of countries following disasters/emergencies generated by natural hazards.

project_title: post disaster needs assessment and recovery preparedness
